import React from 'react' function Rating(props) { const { value, text } = props return (
Ocena: = 1 ? 'fa-solid fa-star' : value >= 0.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-regular fa-star' }> = 2 ? 'fa-solid fa-star' : value >= 1.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-regular fa-star' }> = 3 ? 'fa-solid fa-star' : value >= 2.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-regular fa-star' }> = 4 ? 'fa-solid fa-star' : value >= 3.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-regular fa-star' }> = 5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star' : value >= 4.5 ? 'fa-solid fa-star-half-stroke' : 'fa-regular fa-star' }> {text}
) } export default Rating
